hero.title: Your Global Purchases in Morocco: Simplified, Fast, No Surprises.
hero.subtitle: Access the best brands from USA, Turkey, Spain and France. We handle everything from purchase to direct delivery to your door in Morocco. Experience borderless shopping!
hero.testimonial: Thanks to shipit, I was able to order exclusive items from the USA that I couldn't find in Morocco. The consolidation really reduced costs, and delivery was fast with no customs issues. I recommend 100%!

carouselTestimonial1.quote: Shipit has completely transformed my online shopping experience. No more worrying about customs fees or delivery delays. The service is exceptional and the team is incredibly responsive!
carouselTestimonial1.author: Ahmed M.

carouselTestimonial2.quote: Excellent service! I received my orders faster than expected. The team is very professional and responsive. Highly recommend for anyone shopping internationally.
carouselTestimonial2.author: Sara K.

carouselTestimonial3.quote: The consolidation feature saved me so much money on shipping. I can now buy from multiple stores and ship everything together. This is exactly what I needed!
carouselTestimonial3.author: Youssef B.

carouselTestimonial4.quote: Amazing customer support! They helped me with every step of my first international purchase. The process was smooth and transparent from start to finish.
carouselTestimonial4.author: Layla R.

carouselTestimonial5.quote: I've been using Shipit for over a year now. Their reliability and attention to detail make them my go-to for all international purchases.
carouselTestimonial5.author: Karim T.

howItWorks.title: How It Works?
howItWorks.subtitle: Transform your shopping desires into reality through a simple and interactive process
howItWorks.step1: 1. Sign up and get a delivery address through Shipit.
howItWorks.step2: 2. Shop at stores of your choice and ship your items to your new address.
howItWorks.step3: 3. Consolidate your packages to pay less

ourServices.title: You Buy, We Deliver.
ourServices.subtitle: Our process is designed to be simple and transparent, ensuring you a hassle-free experience from start to finish.

step1.title: Create Your Account and Get Your FREE Address
step1.description: Join Shipit in a few clicks! Instantly receive your personalized reshipping address in Turkey, Europe or the United States.

step2.title: Shop Online, We Handle Reception
step2.description: Make your purchases on your favorite sites in Turkey, Europe or the United States and have them delivered to your new Shipit address. We take over as soon as your package arrives.

step3.title: Customize Your Shipment: Your Choices, Your Savings
step3.description: As soon as your package arrives with us, you are notified! This is the time to customize your shipment so it arrives exactly as you want it.
step3.feature1: Detailed photos of content: ensure the condition of your items.
step3.feature2: Smart grouping: combine several packages and save up to 80% on shipping costs.
step3.feature3: Reinforced protection: add adhesive or extra bubble wrap for optimal security.

step4.title: Receive Your Package Directly in Morocco
step4.description: Once your shipment is configured, relax! We take care of everything so your package arrives at your door in Morocco.

step5.title: Enjoy Your Purchases!
step5.description: Your package has arrived? Congratulations! All you have left is to enjoy your new items. Don't wait for your next shopping sprees, we're here for you!

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Our Platform Over Traditional Solutions?
whyChooseUs.subtitle: Unlike traditional solutions or family favors abroad, we are the first Moroccan platform offering a complete international purchase and reshipping service with satisfaction guarantee.

issue2.title: International bank card required:
issue2.description: Impossible to purchase without international card.

issue5.title: Limited support:
issue5.description: Assistance only in case of major problem.

ourPlatform.title: Our platform: All-in-one service, designed for you!

benefit1.title: All-in-one platform:
benefit1.description: Reshipping AND assisted purchase on a single interface.

benefit2.title: Total transparency:
benefit2.description: All fees displayed from the start, no surprises.

benefit3.title: Real-time tracking:
benefit3.description: Complete visibility of your order at every step.

benefit4.title: Personalized support:
benefit4.description: Dedicated support from purchase to delivery.

benefit5.title: Satisfaction guarantee:
benefit5.description: Guaranteed service with refund if you're not satisfied.

weBuyForYou.title: We Buy For You!
weBuyForYou.subtitle: No international bank card or difficulties buying online?
weBuyForYou.description: Give us your desired item list. We buy them for you and add them to your shipment.

column1.title: No Card, No Stress
column1.subtitle: We buy for you, no hidden fees.

weBuyForYou.step2: We check availability and proceed with purchasing the products
weBuyForYou.step3: Once received, we ship them to you.

partnerBrands.title: Order from Your Favorite Sites
partnerBrands.subtitle: Don't limit yourself anymore! Shop on Trendyol, Amazon, Vente-Privée, eBay or any other site in Turkey, Europe or the United States — we take care of the rest.

pricing.title: Start Saving Today!
pricing.subtitle: Get a free address in the United States, Turkey, Spain or France. We handle everything from purchase to direct delivery to your door in Morocco.
